rows.label: qst101602_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey! Whaddaya think you're doing?
That riddle's destined to be solved
by the great Erebos!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0002
rows.name:
Wait a minute... You're the Driver
bunch that got me my knife back,
aren't you?

rows.label: qst101602_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to my lucky knife, I managed
to work out the meaning behind this
mural!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems to be pointing to an ancient
Nopon treasure trove.

rows.label: qst101602_msg0005
rows.name:
There's gotta be something in this
"belly of the hermit"...

rows.label: qst101602_msg0006
rows.name:
Hey, what's that supposed to mean?
I'm a treasure hunter.

rows.label: qst101602_msg0007
rows.name:
And I'll be darned if I don't find that
treasure before you folks!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0009
rows.name:
"One in the belly of the hermit."
Hmm... What could it mean...?
